text: @Lorrain22492203 I've been risking an occasional purchase from the pizza business that sent free pizzas every hour (a cartload at a time) to the Wisconsin Protests in 2011-2012. They kept it up for MONTHS. They deserve my business now. #Resist #TrumpMustGo #TrumpCrimesAgainstHumanity #COVID19
